title: Explore local R libraries
text: get count installed packages libraries, optionally total sizes, use lib_summaary().
code: library(libminer) ## basic example code  lib_summary() #>                                                                                        Library #> 1                         /Library/Frameworks/R.framework/Versions/4.3-arm64/Resources/library #> 2 /private/var/folders/yj/9dzgt3y51fbf33b3qvfn1crc0000gr/T/RtmpJ2zQFj/temp_libpath9f2728445c37 #>   n_packages #> 1        275 #> 2          1

title: R Library Summary — lib_summary
text: Provide brief summary package libraries machine

title: R Library Summary — lib_summary
text: size logical value indicate whether calcluate library sizes. Default FALSE

title: R Library Summary — lib_summary
text: data.frame containing count packages user's libraries. size = TRUE, column library sizes added.

title: R Library Summary — lib_summary
code: lib_summary() #>                           Library n_packages #> 1 /home/runner/work/_temp/Library         69 #> 2      /opt/R/4.3.1/lib/R/library         29 #> 3 /opt/R/4.3.1/lib/R/site-library          1 lib_summary(size = TRUE) #>                           Library n_packages lib_size #> 1 /home/runner/work/_temp/Library         69 72894148 #> 2      /opt/R/4.3.1/lib/R/library         29 69575875 #> 3 /opt/R/4.3.1/lib/R/site-library          1 14838588
